name: Sweet Honey Bear
description:
You control the bear with the arrow keys. Look for the tree with the hive. Get to it and you engage in a battle to avoid the bees and to get the sweet honey. If you get pushed out, then you have to find another tree. The more honey the bear gets, the happier the bear is. Can you make the bear feel happy?

It is now after Ludum Dare 31. I have updated a few things. The stand can now be reached and the bear can purchase a special effect that can temporarily freeze bees. Use space bar to activate it.
